column5: Group of 10 just got back from the Cabonga this weekend. They reported water levels fairly normal but slowly dropping. Weather was variable but not too cold. They caught about 185 pike and 185 walleye in their 5 day trip. Biggest walleye at 23" and biggest pike at 10 pounds. They fish all different varieties of lures and methods and say they caught a few on everything from jigging to trolling. This group has gone there many years so they know the spots that produce the fish.
